info.brief_description: One day you awake to find yourself alone with one or more Disney actresses...
info.description:
One day you suddenly awaken to find yourself alone with one or more Disney actresses.

By alone, there is not a defined place necessarily, but you are alone enough that they can not just walk out and go back to their life. You are either locked/trapped in a room/area with them, or you are some place with them that has no other people and you can't leave.

Do whatever you want. Anything goes! Have fun and make it interesting. Try to be descriptive.

You are a 17 year old (guy/girl). Further description should be in the story as details are picked.

Disney actresses include:
-Selena Gomez
-Demi Lovato
-Miley Cyrus

Rules:
-No guys except yourself
-No killing
-Sex and more is fine
-Use reasonable grammar, spelling, and punctuation (no one is perfect, but it needs to be reasonably good)
